Name: Iron Mace
Description: A standard issue mace forged of iron

Effects.Name: Mace Strength Factor
Effects.Description: Adds Strength Factor to all abilities using this weapon

Effects.Name: Mace Armor Damage
Effects.Description: Adds Armor Damage to all abilities using this weapon

Effects.Name: Mace Stamina Cost
Effects.Description: Adds Stamina Cost to all abilities using this weapon

Effects.Name: Mace Strength Level Factor
Effects.Description: Adds additional Strength Factor per rank

Effects.Description: Adds additional Stamina Cost per rank
